abstract: Closing statements were heard in the trial of Rajat K. Gupta, the highest profile individual to be ensnared by the government’s insider trading crackdown.
snippet: Closing statements were heard in the trial of Rajat K. Gupta, the highest profile individual to be ensnared by the government’s insider trading crackdown.
lead_paragraph: As a director of some of America’s most well-known companies, Rajat K. Gupta was the ultimate insider, entrusted with confidential information about corporate earnings and major transactions.

headline.main: Prosecutors Draw ‘Secret Pipeline’ Pattern; Defense Asks, ‘Where’s the Beef?’

byline.original: By Azam Ahmed and Peter Lattman
